channel.title: * Perfectscape * | Development Team | [PI]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2retu05.png[/img]
[i][b]WE NEED TESTERS TO HELP US FIND BUGS, ALL TESTERS WILL GET OWNER RANK FOR TESTING PURPOSES ! TESTING IS ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL 10-22-12!![/b][/i]
[b]Progress[/b] [ul][li]Website 60% you can check the progress [url=http://perfectscape.net/forum/]http://perfectscape.net/forum/[/url][/li] [li]Server 40%-(Nex added, Minigames cleaned up, All known dupes fixed)[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Client 55%- (Money pouch added, custom tab effects added everywhere :cool:)[/li][/ul]
Media ( This is just to show nex and some server features) [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ViR3wdEiHbk&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[b]The Team[/b]
[ul][li]Th3 -Me[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/ega1vl.png[/img] [b]Current vps[/b] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2cdjpsj.png[/img]
This project will not cram new content, but instead make existing content cleaner and less unorganized while adding features to accommodate the Perfectscape theme. The goal for this project is to take an average PI server with average content. Add above average client work. Such as custom shop interfaces, Custom tab effects, etc etc. Then focus on making the existing content cleaner. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/sxp500.png[/img]
[b]Why should I apply ?[/b]
[ul][li]Much work done will be to the cache and client. Filling the large gap for programmers with not much skill in these areas. [/li] [li] Community's build fast. We plan on hosting once we feel we are ready as a team. This is your chance to be a part of a successful community[/li] [li]Your hard work will never be sold or released! You will always be able to login and say hello, because the server will be hosted not released.[/li] [li]We won't even accept donations until we grow as a community. And even then they will be limited and only used to upgrade the server-vps to keep up with the growing community.[/li] [li][b]There is no Owner, Server programmers Co-Owners... etc.. Just programmers who enjoying a relaxing environment doing something we enjoy. [/b][/li][/ul]
Please use this format to apply. You must answer honestly and to the best of your knowledge. [u]Applying without this format or answering dishonestly will destroy any chances of joining this team.[/u] [code] Name: How many past PI projects have you worked on?: What is your longest time actively working with a Development team on one single project?(Days, Weeks, Months, etc..): On a scale of 1-10 how familiar are you with PI?: What is your timezone? How many hours a week can you be active? Why does this project interest you?: Are you currently working on a project?: Give as much past work as you possibly can: Anything else you would like to add: [/code]
Thank you for your interest, ~Th3

I’d like to talk to you more

item.title: * Perfectscape * | Development Team | [PI]
item.dc:creator: @lui-scape lui-scape
item.description:
@lui-scape wrote:

Name: Chance
How many past PI projects have you worked on?: 4-6
What is your longest time actively working with a Development team on one single project?(Days, Weeks, Months, etc…): About 3 weeks
On a scale of 1-10 how familiar are you with PI?: 7.5!
What is your timezone? (UTC-06:00) Central Time (US & Canada)
How many hours a week can you be active? I can be active 3-4 hours a day so about, 21+ a week
Why does this project interest you?: Sounds like a good experience to learn and meet new people.
Are you currently working on a project?: Nope!
Give as much past work as you possibly can: I don’t have any current projects on mopar
Anything else you would like to add: Sounds like fun. (Im looking to be a coder)

Read full topic

Name: Brad
How many past PI projects have you worked on?: Like 7 or 10 only a couple got online.
What is your longest time actively working with a Development team on one single project?(Days, Weeks, Months, etc…): I worked on one foe 4 months and i think its still going now.
On a scale of 1-10 how familiar are you with PI?: 9
What is your timezone? Im from australia.
How many hours a week can you be active? During the week i can be active almost every afternoon for atleast 3-5 hours.
Why does this project interest you?: Looks like a nice project to work on. Also looks like it could go somewhere.
Are you currently working on a project?: Not at the moment.
Anything else you would like to add: Looking forward to see if i can work with you. I have skype will give out if needed.
[/quote]

hello brad,
Can you show any past experience?
my user for skype is: perfectscape
approved on the forums, its only like that until release so we avoid 100% of spammers[/quote]

Okay I added you on skype look forward to hear from you.

item.title: * Perfectscape * | Development Team | [PI]
item.dc:creator: @PerfectscapeRSPS PerfectscapeRSPS
item.description:
@PerfectscapeRSPS wrote:

Kidpaparoach:

Heads up it wont work out if it did work we wouldn’t have a government. We elect people who we think can make the right decisions for us and thus we have a chain of command. We give them power and they should do what we want (even though they don’t) but gl none the less.

You have a point but this is a team of 3-4 people max. I feel that making decisions as a group will be much easier then a full blown government

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:

Heads up it wont work out if it did work we wouldn’t have a government. We elect people who we think can make the right decisions for us and thus we have a chain of command. We give them power and they should do what we want (even though they don’t) but gl none the less.

item.title: * Perfectscape * | Development Team | [PI]
item.dc:creator: @PerfectscapeRSPS PerfectscapeRSPS
item.description:
@PerfectscapeRSPS wrote:

SnowStar:

The tab effects look like they came from Solitude. Good luck though!

Yeah, I’ve built a graveyard of PI’s taking some of the ideas I can use. This came from “webberscape” hard to tell who came up with it originally, its just a simple image that takes 10mins to make and I’ve already changed the color so I won’t give any credits.

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:3, topic:464322”]Tab colour clashes but looks cool I guess^.

Having no owner makes a problem when it comes to what ideas will be implemented. You need a chain of command.[/quote]
tweaked it a bit

I want a democracy, any ideas get voted on by the programmers. My goal is to keep things open and give our programmers some say. (at times I may have to step in and push us in the right direction.)

If this doesn’t work out its easy to make a chain of command.

Read full topic

item.title: * Perfectscape * | Development Team | [PI]
item.dc:creator: @PerfectscapeRSPS PerfectscapeRSPS
item.description:
@PerfectscapeRSPS wrote:

2retu05.png832×300

WE NEED TESTERS TO HELP US FIND BUGS, ALL TESTERS WILL GET OWNER RANK FOR TESTING PURPOSES !
TESTING IS ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL 10-22-12!!

Progress
[ul][li]Website 60% you can check the progress http://perfectscape.net/forum/[/li]
[li]Server 40%-(Nex added, Minigames cleaned up, All known dupes fixed)[/li][/ul]

[ul][li]Client 55%- (Money pouch added, custom tab effects added everywhere )[/li][/ul]

Media ( This is just to show nex and some server features)
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ViR3wdEiHbk&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

The Team

[ul][li]Th3 -Me[/li][/ul]


Current vps

This project will not cram new content, but instead make existing content cleaner and less unorganized while adding features to accommodate the Perfectscape theme.
The goal for this project is to take an average PI server with average content. Add above average client work. Such as custom shop interfaces, Custom tab effects, etc etc. Then focus on making the existing content cleaner.

Why should I apply ?

[ul][li]Much work done will be to the cache and client. Filling the large gap for programmers with not much skill in these areas. [/li]
[li] Community’s build fast. We plan on hosting once we feel we are ready as a team. This is your chance to be a part of a successful community[/li]
[li]Your hard work will never be sold or released! You will always be able to login and say hello, because the server will be hosted not released.[/li]
[li]We won’t even accept donations until we grow as a community. And even then they will be limited and only used to upgrade the server-vps to keep up with the growing community.[/li]
[li]There is no Owner, Server programmers Co-Owners… etc… Just programmers who enjoying a relaxing environment doing something we enjoy. [/li][/ul]

Please use this format to apply. You must answer honestly and to the best of your knowledge.
Applying without this format or answering dishonestly will destroy any chances of joining this team.

Name:
How many past PI projects have you worked on?:
What is your longest time actively working with a Development team on one single project?(Days, Weeks, Months, etc..):
On a scale of 1-10 how familiar are you with PI?:
What is your timezone?
How many hours a week can you be active?
Why does this project interest you?:
Are you currently working on a project?:
Give as much past work as you possibly can:
Anything else you would like to add:

Thank you for your interest,
~Th3

Read full topic
